entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
